
Slick Video 8.x-1.0-dev, 2016-12-07
-----------------------------------
- Fixed for coding standards.

Slick Video 8.x-1.0-dev, 2016-11-29
-----------------------------------
- Updated .info file.

Slick Video 8.x-1.0-dev, 2016-11-09
-----------------------------------
- Set dimensions once if applicable.

Slick Video 8.x-1.0-dev, 2016-10-13
-----------------------------------
- Removed the no-longer-used \Drupal\video_embed_field\ProviderManagerInterface.

Slick Video 8.x-1.0-dev, 2016-08-30
-----------------------------------
- Changed formatter name to Title case.

Slick Video 8.x-1.0-dev, 2016-08-29
-----------------------------------
- #2769485 by Vendramini: Image styles not generating.

Slick Video 8.x-1.0-dev, 2016-07-15
-----------------------------------
- A few cleanups.

Slick Video 8.x-1.0-dev, 2016-06-10
-----------------------------------
- Added Blazy check to simplify Blazy inclusion later on.

Slick Video 8.x-1.0-dev, 2016-05-09
-----------------------------------
- Removed redundant Preloader option since the classes are within image
  containers. Maybe more reasonable for Views later which can text, images, etc.

Slick Video 8.x-1.0-dev, 2016-05-05
-----------------------------------
- Added option Preloader for Slick > 1.5.9 (which is unfortunately still broken).

Slick Video 8.x-1.0-dev, 2016-04-11
-----------------------------------
- A couple of cleanups.

Slick Video 8.x-1.0-dev, 2016-04-06
-----------------------------------
- Initial commit.
